fediverse_verification.description: Enable Fediverse Username Verification by adding rel="me" to the user's profile URL

colorscheme.description: Set a colorscheme for the theme. Available options: catppuccin, clean, dracula, github, gruvbox, iceberg, minimal, minimal_wb, monokai, nord, one, solarized, typewriter

colorscheme_toggle.description: Show a colorscheme dropdown selector in the footer allowing users to switch between colorschemes

colormodetoggle.description: Show a light/dark mode toggle button in the navigation

colormode.description: Set the default color mode. Options: light, dark, auto (follows system preference)

customization.colors: Edit CSS custom properties in static/style.css
customization.content: Use Markdown fragments in content/ directory
